Life expectancy - Sex: total - Age: 0 -.titleLong: Life expectancy at birth - HMD – totals, period tables
Life expectancy - Sex: total - Age: 0 -.descriptionShort: The period life expectancy at birth among totals, in a given year.
descriptionKey: Period life expectancy is a metric that summarizes death rates across all age groups in one particular year.

For a given year, it represents the average lifespan for a hypothetical group of people, if they experienced the same age-specific death rates throughout their whole lives as the age-specific death rates seen in that particular year.
Prior to 1950, we use HMD (2025) data. From 1950 onwards, we use UN WPP (2024) data.
